哈草奇兵合唱团, 表演者
脂氧合酶, 脂氧酶, 酶, 氧合酶

sentences.sentence: "I will take you to the King," said Fox Lox.
sentences.translation: “我带你们去见森林之王吧。”狐狸说。

sentences.sentence: "Oh, Fox Lox," said Turkey Lurkey "the sky is falling!"
sentences.translation: “噢，狐狸，”火鸡说：“天要掉下来了！”

sentences.sentence: Lipoxygenases (LOX) are a group of nonheme Fe containing proteins.
sentences.translation: 脂氧合酶(LOX)是一类非血红素铁蛋白。
